name: son2lpi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wn(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

stmt.origin: mto(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))

-| wn(wbr(c0, c1, c0))
-| wi(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)), wbr(c0, c1, c0))

|- wn(wa(wbr(c0, c1, c2), wbr(c2, c1, c0)))

body.origin:

-| wor(c1, c3)
-| wss(c1, cxp(c3, c3))

comment: A strict order relation has no 2-cycle loops. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-1996.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2013.)
